c. 1863 · N 52

1. A-flat major

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. A minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

3. A-flat major

Fauré wrote versions of this piece for solo piano (N 52.3a) and for piano duet (N 52.3b). A manuscript of the version for solo piano has notable differences to the final, published version. Further, an arrangement for cello (or violin) and chamber orchestra (N 52.3c) was published under Fauré’s name, but is, in fact, by Albert Périlhou.

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Duration: 2' 30"
